title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 657.2 - Types of marine toilets eligible for approval
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 657.2 - Types of marine toilets eligible for approval

State Regulations

Subject to the provisions of sections 657.3 and
657.4
of this Part the following
types of marine toilets for use on watercraft may be approved by the
department, to wit: (a) Marine sewage
retention assemblies. (b) Marine
sewage recirculating assemblies. (c) Marine sewage incinerating
assemblies. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
657.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
